name: Inktober 2020 Demo Disc
description:
For Inktober this year, I wanted to produce a series of models/dioramas to serve as a more visually varied demo for the Godot PSX shaders I've worked on recently. As a fun way to showcase them, I decided to put together this interactive gallery, stylized as a PS1 demo disc.

PS1 disc reading sound: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5avty_d1rTI

In-game font is Squarebit by https://frankqbe.tumblr.com/ (CC BY 4.0 - no edits made)

Fanart credits:
  • "3: Bulky" -  Dominion
  • "5: Blade" - Kings Field IV
  • "15: Outpost" - Age of Empires II
  • "16: Rocket" - Team Fortress II
Known bugs:
  • "2 - Wisp" and "24 - Dig" will freeze for a short time when displaying for the first time
  • Please leave details in the comments if you find more!
Explore more:

Original shader demo:  https://menacingmecha.itch.io/godot-psx-style-demo

Download these shaders here (MIT License!): https://github.com/MenacingMecha/godot-psx-style-demo

NOTE: The shaders in these featured links are out of date and will be updated in the near future
